item.title: Mocha Test Reports in VSTS
item.description: Here’s another dev thing I use: MochaJS in Visual Studio Team Services (VSTS) builds and display the test reports as part of the build reports. See? Like this. This wasn’t me trying to fit a square peg into a round hole. VSTS is exceptionally flexible and it comes bundled with all the pieces you need to do this out of the box. The key is making sure that we setup our test runner to produce the output VSTS needs.
